analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
analytics.purpose: Collect anonymous information about how you use our site, helping us improve user experience and identify issues.
analytics.title: Analytics Cookies

contact.addressDetails: LegacyGuard Ltd, Data Protection Office, 123 Privacy Street, Dublin, Ireland
contact.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:
contact.title: Contact Us About Cookies

marketing.purpose: Track visitors across websites to display ads that are relevant and engaging for individual users.
marketing.title: Marketing Cookies

necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly
necessary.purpose: Enable core functionality such as security, identity verification, and network management. These cookies cannot be disabled.
necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies

overview.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how LegacyGuard uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.
overview.point1: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of our website
overview.point2: Some cookies are essential and cannot be disabled
overview.point3: You can control non-essential cookies through our consent manager
overview.point4: We never sell your data or use cookies for invasive tracking
overview.title: Important Information

preferences.purpose: Allow the website to remember choices you make (such as language or region) and provide enhanced, personalized features.
preferences.title: Preference Cookies

policy.subtitle: Understanding how we use cookies to improve your experience while respecting your privacy
policy.title: Cookie Policy

yourRights.description: You have full control over your cookie preferences
yourRights.right1: Access information about the cookies we use
yourRights.right2: Withdraw consent for non-essential cookies at any time
yourRights.right4: Opt-out of analytics and marketing cookies
yourRights.title: Your Rights

dataOwnership.description: Du ejer dine data, altid. Du kan downloade en komplet kopi når som helst.
dataOwnership.title: Dataejerskab

dataTransparency.description: Vi tror på total gennemsigtighed. Her er præcis, hvordan vi håndterer dine oplysninger.
dataTransparency.loadingError: Kunne ikke indlæse transparensdata. Prøv venligst igen senere.

recentActivity.premiumText: Din 30-dages operationelle log giver grundlæggende sikkerhed. For maksimal ansvarlighed og ro i sindet, opgrader til Command-pakken for at opretholde en komplet, uændret revisionshistorik over enhver handling foretaget i din boks, for evigt.
recentActivity.premiumTitle: Lås op for din permanente overvågningslog
recentActivity.title: Seneste aktivitet

dataTransparency.title: Dine data, din kontrol

privacySettings.choose_how_documents_are_proce_4: Vælg, hvordan dokumenter behandles som standard
privacySettings.combines_local_and_cloud_ai_fo_6: Kombinerer lokal og cloud AI for optimal ydeevne og privatliv
privacySettings.control_how_your_documents_are_2: Kontroller, hvordan dine dokumenter behandles og lagres
privacySettings.processes_documents_entirely_i_8: Behandler dokumenter helt i din browser for maksimal privatliv
privacySettings.you_can_always_override_this_s_10: Du kan altid tilsidesætte denne indstilling, når du uploader individuelle dokumenter
